fields.description: I have created a watch IOS project in Swift on Xcode. Now, i'm trying to implement this project with an existing phone app project that i had built in Titanium. My issue is I'm getting errors since the Titanium environment isn't recognizing the Swift packages. Please help.
fields.summary: How to utilize swift dependencies in Titanium project?
